definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
Gaochun county in Nanjing 南京, Jiangsu
Gaochun county in Nanjing 南京, Jiangsu

sentences.english: Chung identified the man as a 58-year old surnamed Kim.
sentences.chinese: 淳鑑定該死者系58歲金姓男子。

sentences.english: The spirit of the custom is purity and simplicity, which manifests common customs of feminized culture.
sentences.chinese: 其總體精神是“淳和質樸”，是陰柔文化的世俗化。

sentences.english: Among Zhu Xi's disciples, Chen Chun is considered to be one who had more inventions and original idea.
sentences.chinese: 在朱熹門人中，陳淳被認爲是多有發明和創見的一位。

sentences.english: Chun flutter good feelings turn into beating of the notes.
sentences.chinese: 淳撲善良的心聲，化作了跳動的音符。

sentences.english: Chen Chun, who was a good apprentice of Zhu Xi.
sentences.chinese: 陳淳是理學家朱熹的高徒。

sentences.english: Chen Chun' s philosophy theory had a far-reaching impact on later age.
sentences.chinese: 陳淳的哲學思想，對後世產生了深遠的影響。

definition: clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
